attachments.title: Wooden Desktop Arcade Might Be the Most Beautiful Retro Hardware I've Ever Seen
attachments.text: 8Bitdo, the company behind those Bluetooth SNES and NES controllers that let you play classic 8 and 16-bit games without annoying wires, is teasing this gorgeous wooden retro desktop arcade on its Facebook page, and at the Gamescom convention currently underway in Cologne, Germany.
attachments.fallback: Gizmodo: Wooden Desktop Arcade Might Be the Most Beautiful Retro Hardware I've Ever Seen
